scripts.install-wp-cli: docker-compose exec wordpress bash -c "curl -O https://raw.githubusercontent.com/wp-cli/builds/gh-pages/phar/wp-cli.phar && chmod +x wp-cli.phar && mv wp-cli.phar /usr/local/bin/wp && apk add --update --no-cache less"
scripts.install-mysql: docker-compose exec wordpress bash -c "apk add --update --no-cache mysql-client"
scripts.install: npm run install-wp-cli && npm run install-mysql && npm run start
